不存在的檔案。如果你擁有權限，可以建立新檔案。
Böyle bir belge bulunmamaktadır. Yetki izniniz varsa, belgeyi siz oluşturabilirsiniz.
Không có bài viết nào. Nếu bạn có được sự cho phép, hãy gửi một bài viết mới.

item.name: about_arrange_list
item.value: 데이터 이전하였거나 의도하지 않은 경우에 의해 제목 Alias가 설정되지 않아서 위키 글을 찾아갈 수 없는 문서들을 일괄적으로 제목 Alias를 설정해줍니다.
It creates aliases for documents which do not have aliases for title due to data migration or unexpected errors.
データの移動や意図してないケースにより、タイトルAliasが設定されてないためアクセス出来なかったWikiドキュメントのタイトルAliasを再度一括整理します。
生成别名给那些由于数据转移或意外错误导致无别名的文档。
데이터 이전하였거나 의도하지 않은 경우에 의해 제목 Alias가 설정되지 않아서 위키 글을 찾아갈 수 없는 문서들을 일괄적으로 제목 Alias를 설정해줍니다.
Veri taşınmasından veya beklenmedik bir hatadan dolayı başlık için bir takma adı olmayan belgelere takma ad oluşturur.
Nếu từ đầu bạn không tạo mục hoặc Alias cho những bài viết, thì không thể truy cập vào được Wiki. Lúc này tất cả mọi bài viết sẽ tự động được chuyển thành Alias.

item.name: about_markup_type
item.value: 내용추가를 위한 HTML 마크업은 XE Editor를 사용합니다. MediaWiki나 GoogleCode와 같은 <짧은 태그>형식의 위키 마크업은 간단한 text를 사용합니다.
XE Wiki markup uses XE Editor and HTML for adding content. Markdown, MediaWiki and GoogleCode markup use a simpler syntax, much more appropriate for wikis. %sSee some examples%s
HTML markup uses the XE Editor for adding content, while Wiki markup uses simple text with wiki tags (shortcode) just like the ones in MediaWiki or GoogleCode.
HTML标记通过XE编辑器添加内容，Wiki 标记（例如 MediaWiki 或者 GoogleCode）通过简单的文本以及wiki的标签添加内容。
HTML markup uses the XE Editor for adding content, while Wiki markup uses simple text with wiki tags (shortcode) just like the ones in MediaWiki or GoogleCode.
HTML markup uses the XE Editor for adding content, while Wiki markup uses simple text with wiki tags (shortcode) just like the ones in MediaWiki or GoogleCode.
HTML markup uses the XE Editor for adding content, while Wiki markup uses simple text with wiki tags (shortcode) just like the ones in MediaWiki or GoogleCode.

item.name: create_first_page_title
item.value: 欢迎来到 XpressEngine 维基系统!

item.name: create_first_page_description
item.value: 생성된 문서가 없습니다. 새로운 페이지를 생성하세요.
You don't have any documents yet. Go ahead and add your first page!
你暂时还没有任何文章，添加第一个页面吧!

item.name: create_first_page_markdown_help
item.value:
You haven't created any pages yet so here's a few tips to get you started.
You should now that XpressEngine Wiki now uses [Markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) as its default syntax for adding content.
### What is Markdown?
Here's how it's presented on its website:
> _Markdown is a text-to-HTML conversion tool for web writers. Markdown allows you to write using an easy-to-read, easy-to-write plain text format, then convert it to structurally valid XHTML (or HTML)._
But what does this mean? Let's see some examples!
### Markdown in action
#### Styling and headers
You can write in *italics* just by surrounding you words with stars like \*this\*. Make them \*\*double\*\* and you'll get **bold**.
For headings, like the one above use
\# Heading 1
\## Heading 2
\#\#\# Heading 3
or even simpler, divide content with many dashes:
---------------------------
#### Links
Just add an url directly in you content and it will be directly linked: http://www.xpressengine.org.
If you also want to add a description use a bracket combination, just like on [the official website](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax#link).
You can also link to pages inside the same wiki, but instead of using an url you have to specify the document alias - \[some description\]\(page_alias\) and you're done!
### Lists
\- Use a minus sign for a bullet
\+ Or plus sign
\* Or an asterisk
\1. Numbered lists are easy
\2. Markdown keeps track of the numbers for you
\7. So this will be item 3.
### More info
This page was just a quick intro to get you started. For more help, take a look at:
+ PHP Markdown extra - http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/extra/ + Markdown's official reference - http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax

你还没有建立任何页面，这里提供一些帮助提示。
XpressEngine 维基系统使用 [Markdown](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/) 作为默认的语法规则来添加内容。
### 什么是 Markdown?
以下是Markdown官网的描述：
> _Markdown 是一个 文本-HTML 的转换工具，它允许你在写文章时使用一种易读写的文本格式，然后将其转换成标准的XHTML（或者HTML）
是什么意思呢？请看一些例子！
### Markdown in action
#### 样式与头部
你可以使用 \* 例如 \*this\*为单词两边添加*号。使用 \*\*double\*\* 你将会得到 **double**
写头部时， 可以使用以下代码
\# Heading 1
\## Heading 2
\#\#\# Heading 3
或者更简单，使用减号即可：
---------------------------
#### 链接
只要将url直接添加到内容（例如 http://www.xpressengine.org），就会被自动显示为链接。
可以使用中括号为链接提供名称，例如 [the official website](http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax#link)
如果你希望链接到同一个维基的其他页面，你则需要使用页面别名， 例如 \[some description\]\(page_alias\)
### 列表
\- 使用减号代表圆点
\+ 或者加号
\* 或者星号
\1. 有序列表非常简单
\2. Markdown 会对你的列表保持跟踪
\7. 此行将为3
### 更多信息
这个页面简单地介绍了怎样使用Markdown。请点击以下链接获得更多帮助
+ PHP Markdown extra - http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/extra/ + Markdown's 官方参考 - http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax

item.name: you_are_viewing
item.value: You are currently viewing this page in %s

item.name: confirm_document_override
item.value: The document has been updated by someone else. Do you still want to save your changes?

item.name: markdown_help
item.value:
# Heading 1 # ## Heading 2 ## ### Heading 3 ############## *italic*, **bold** escape \* - Use a minus sign for a bullet list + Or plus sign * Or an asterisk 1. Numbered lists are easy 2. Markdown keeps track of the numbers for you 7. So this will be item 3. Links:    http://site/page    Add description: [Page description](http://site/page)    Link to pages in the same wiki: [Page description](page_alias) Smart links:    Add a name or id to your link: [Here's a nice link][1]    And then detail it in the page footer for clarity: [1]: www.google.com Images: ![Image description](url_to_image) Line breaks - Add an empty line - Add two spaces the end of a line For more help, take a look at:
  • PHP Markdown extra - http://michelf.com/projects/php-markdown/extra/
  • Markdown's official reference - http://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax

item.name: googlecode_markup_help
item.value: =Heading1= ==Heading2== ===Heading3=== *bold* _italic_ `inline code` escape: `*` Indent lists 2 spaces: * bullet item # numbered list {{{ verbatim code block }}} Horizontal rule ---- WikiWordLink [http://domain/page label] http://domain/page || table || cells || For more help, take a look at http://code.google.com/p/support/wiki/WikiSyntax

item.name: mediawiki_markup_help
item.value: == Heading2 == === Heading3 === '''bold''' ''italic'' <nowiki>Escape wiki markup</nowiki> Lists * bullet item ** deeper level # numbered list Horizontal rule ---- Links [[Internal_link]] [[Internal_link | You should use page alias]] http://domain/page [http://domain/page label] Table: {| |Orange |Apple |- |Bread |Pie |- |Butter |Ice cream |} For more help, take a look at http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Help:Formatting

item.name: xe_wiki_markup_help
item.value: XE Wiki markup uses XE Editor to add content. This is the way documents were added in older versions of XE Wiki.

item.name: diff_no_differences
item.value: There are no differences between the two versions.
